## Mileage vs Horsepower
#### * points are weighted

```{r load data,include=FALSE}
suppressWarnings(library(plotly))
```

```{r, echo=FALSE}

set.seed(123) #need for scattr only
#plot_ly(mtcars,x=~mpg,y=~hp,color=~disp, type="scatter", mode="markers",size=~wt)  #scatter+color+crosshairs




p<-plot_ly(mtcars,x=~mpg,y=~hp,color=~disp, size=~wt) %>%
    add_markers() %>%
    add_fun(function(anno_mpg){
     anno_mpg %>% slice(which.max(mpg)) %>%
        add_annotations("High mileage") }) %>%
    add_fun(function(anno_hp){
        anno_hp %>% slice(which.max(hp)) %>%
        add_annotations("High Horsepower") }) %>%
    add_fun(function(anno_wt){
        anno_wt %>% slice(which.max(wt)) %>%
    add_annotations("Heavy Weight") %>%
    config(displayModeBar = F)})    

p

```
